product_name: Sugoi Evolution Bike Shorts - Women's - 2013 Closeout
long_description: The women's Sugoi Evolution shorts are made for speed, endurance and comfort with high-performance fabric, a lightweight chamois and a fit that stays in place without binding or pinching. Stretchy EvoPlus nylon/polyester/spandex fabric has a gradient-denier construction that pulls moisture outward, enhancing its moisture-wicking, quick-drying qualities. Chamois shapes to the contours of the body with a padded, pressure-sensitive design and reduces hot spots with increased airflow thanks to micro perforations in the chamois. Eight-panel contoured design offers a precise fit for full muscle support. Flatlock stitching is soft and non-chafing next to skin. Elastic grippers keep leg hems in place; elastic waist with flat drawstring delivers a comfortable fit. Sugoi Evolution bike shorts feature reflective logos at right hem and at left hip for added visibility. Closeout.
